description: Try our easy to follow Pumpkin Laksa with Broccolini recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pumpkin Laksa with Broccolini Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide the noodles between bowls and spoon the soup over. Top with chilli and coriander and serve with fresh lime. Tip 1: You could add a little extra crunch to this dish by adding a handful of roasted peanuts or cashew nuts. Tip 2: Laksa can be made with any protein you like so add diced chicken or peeled green prawns. Tip 3: Add baby corn, snow peas and capsicum for extra vegetables.
